channel.title: BlackBookBerry
channel.itunes:author: NBI LLC
channel.description: The staff of the fictitious company, Doogleheimer & Schmitt do blog postings on the site BlackBookBerry.com where they explain how a simple device can revolutionize the truculent world of modernized business. Poking fun at everything from corporate policies to poker night, BlackBookBerry is tapping the funny bone of big corporate tech-pop culture.
channel.itunes:subtitle: "Where low tech meets high expectations."
channel.itunes:summary: BlackBookBerry is a St. Louis-based comedy troupe performing original comedy about a fictitious company called Doogleheimer & Schmitt. This fake company has standardized on a real product called the BlackBookBerry.

item.title: Prestige
item.itunes:author: BlackBookBerry
item.description: The need for prestige is not lost on us.
item.itunes:subtitle: The need for prestige is not lost on us.
item.itunes:summary: Tom explains to his staff that he's found an alternative to the Slackberries they want.
item.itunes:keywords: blackbookberry, office, comedy, funny, humor, pda, technology, tech, gadget, treo, blackberry, iPhone, treo, pre

item.title: Instant Messaging
item.itunes:author: BlackBookBerry

item.itunes:summary: Rick sends Bob an instant message.
